Lookup_Lead_created.description:
Would the flow perform significantly better if I limited the columns in this query?
The downside is you need to edit the select column query if things change.

parameters.$filter:
revops_isocountrycode eq '@{if(
    empty(
        variables('company')?['countryCode']
    ),
    variables('person')?['countryCode'],
    variables('company')?['countryCode']
)}'

Clearbit_stateorprovince.description: This must be declared outside of the conditional elements.

Update_Lead_stateorprovince.description: Allow action to fail gracefully and continue should there be no Clearbit state data or lookup fails using Clearbit data. Clearbit lists England as a province and England will not be found in our dtatabase.
